summary: A presenter, or host / hostess, is a person who guides or introduces an event, especially on television.
full_text: A television presenter is a person who introduces or hosts television programs  Nowadays it is common for minor celebrities in other fields to take on this role, but there are also a number of people who have made their name solely within the field of presenting, particularly within children's television series, to become a television personality.
title: Television presenter
